page.title: 09Sports Centres in Halewood.
page.content: There are two sports centres in our area, one of which is purpose built and one which uses part of a recently closed school. Halewood Town Sports Centre was purpose built in 1981 and has a staff of eighteen. The activities are varied and include boxing, squash, badminton, five-a-side football, gymnastics, volleyball, trampolining, weight training, handball, netball and keep fit sessions. As well as the sporting activities there is a creche, family room and a well stocked bar with snacks. Bridgefield Forum was a secondary school. The main atraction of this centre is the large swimming pool which is used for local galas as well as for general public use. Sporting activities are similar to those of the other sports centre.
